item.description:
You'll have to call me when you are there and this is a first serve basis. By being at the end of the line, you will have a 10% chance getting in rather than 90% where I will be standing. The movie begins at 7:00pm. I'm just going to be there early. This is a 5 star rating, 2 dumbs up good movie!!


Meet with us, sit with us, conversate with us, make new friends with us, network if you like networking with different people or just enjoy being there with us watching a advance screening movie.

It looks like 52 are attending but by experience from this , I know half 20-25 will show up

Unborn Trailer link The Unborn Trailer

If your in the line coming in late, don't hesitate calling me cause I will be with others call me so I can organize the group once the lines start moving in.

Look in the Files section: Unborn - Advance Screening - will be there for you to download and or download , then open and print! If you cannot print one out. I can print a few out for you and meet you somewhere before this time and date of this advance screening and not on Janaury 8th please.

Thanks!


cell: 6174358177


Please do not call me late once I we are in and be responsible.

chau
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs in the long waiting line
item.name: The Unborn - Advance Screening
